thread.title: Doom3->Maya problems (was Help for a noob here!!!)

post.author: freakmean16
post.body:
Hey dudes, please is there anyone who can help me?, I've downloaded the plugin and isntalledi it, but when i try to import a model from Doom i only get the bones of it, I import both the animation and the mesh md5's but well the same result appears, please dudes, if anyone can help me......

Thanks..

Estebishcan...

post.author: der_ton
post.body:
For anyone else wondering, this is apparently about the Doom3->Maya importer:
viewtopic.php?f=52&t=6278&p=205025#p205025

freakman16, next time be a little less secretive about what you're actually talking about, and use a proper thread title. I hope someone can help you soon.
